```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(fredr)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(viridis)
library(flexdashboard)
library(scales)

params <- list(
  start_date = ymd("2018-07-01"),
  end_date = today() - months(2)
)

source("formatting.R")
```
